passive.name: Steerer
passive.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong>. When the wearer hits an enemy target, inflicts Mirage Fizzle on the enemy, lasting for 1 turn. Each time the wearer attacks, this effect can only trigger 1 time on each target. The wearer deals <orangeStrong>{{2, percent}}%</orangeStrong> increased DMG to targets afflicted with Mirage Fizzle, and the DMG dealt by Ultimate additionally increases by <orangeStrong>{{3, percent}}%</orangeStrong>.
